description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 20/3906/FUL dated 03/08/22 for 'Phased redevelopment of site comprising the demolition of all existing buildings and structures and construction of a mixed-use development to comprise a two storey podium level with three buildings above ranging in height from 20 to 24 storeys providing a range of uses including up to 470 residential units (Class C3), office and workspace (Class B1), self-storage (Class B8), flexible community space (Class D1) and a café (Class A3), associated car and cycle parking, public open space, landscaping, vehicular and pedestrian routes, servicing and access arrangements and other associated works.' Amendments include:  Core and Massing Amendments including, Introduction of second staircase adjusting building footprints:  Ground Floor Amendments including, Incorporation of sprinkler tank room; Access to Level 01 parking area for residents of the neighbouring Alcove at The Rockery scheme (currently under determination (Ref. 24/1934/FUL); Consolidation of Self-Storage Area (Use Class B8); Relocation of commercial back of house area; Additional commercial plant area; Relocation of residential entrance lobby and café; and Consolidation of energy centre area:  Level 01 and Parking Amendments including, Additional commercial plant area; Relocation of residential entrance lobby and café; and Parking area rearrangement including provision of 6x wheelchair accessible car parking spaces pertaining to neighbouring The Alcove at The Rockery scheme (currently under determination):  Level 02 Podium and Landscape Amendments including, reduction in private terraces at podium level; and adjustments to footpaths and alignments with entrances as a result of building footprint changes:  roof and terraces amendments including, larger lift overruns at roof level; and introduction of plant screening:  Residential floorspace amendments including, increase to overall proposed residential gross internal floors
